description: Bjorn Kyle is the captain of Desert Lion. He is a defender. His team is from Qatar. He and his team lost against Inazuma Japan in their second match. He has teal hair that is a bit wavy covering his left eye, and has green eyes, with dark shadows under his eyes. His outfit has the design of the Qatar flag. He is shown to be caring for his team as he is determined to win against Inazuma Japan.
name: Bjorn Kyle
